Anyone tried the Adobe updater for this?

Serial in the comments works as advertised.  Also, as long as you have blocked the appropriate servers with the CS4/CS5 activation blocking script, you should be free to update via Adobe at will.

There are no current updates available, but I did ask this copy of Lightroom to check for updates from within the application.  It had no problems, and told me this is the most current version, as of today.

downloaded in less than an hour and the SN worked fine. 
BIG THANKS

- jf
download in two minutes and serial works perfect.
is this some kind of joke? thanks a million for the sn Cylidd :)
It would be nice if you posted the proper information IE no serial/key etc. Too many people rush to upload a release of something you can get faster from the host website.

S/N works great!  Thanks Cylidd!  Torrent is good, so thanks yoeluru.  For anybody having problems, first d/l this torrent and install.  Then activate using the s/n provided by Cylidd.  Finally d/l the update from Adobe to update to version 3.3.  Hope this helps.
